House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05582
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING A CRIMINAL JUSTICE REFORM COMMISSION CHARGED WITH THE INVESTIGATION AND PREVENTION OF WRONGFUL CONVICTIONS
SHORT TITLE : “ Preventing Wrongful Conviction Act ”
ABSTRACT : Provides for the nine-member composition of the Commission and its corresponding duties; Proposes reforms to minimize the likelihood of wrongful convictions, bolster public confidence in the criminal justice system, and ensure that the administration of criminal justice is fair, accurate and reliable.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P., SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
